property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object, Heel, Multi, Raw, Unique

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Back Rake. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any Foreign Object or any card played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver of #D or less, where # is equal to the total number of cards removed from the game, and end your opponent's turn. You may put the card titled Get the 'F'Out from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Stacy Keibler. Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and your maneuvers are +#D for the rest of the turn, where # is equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the Raw logo.

card.name: This Has Gone Over By ... Three Minutes

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 2. The maximum number of Mid-match cards all players may have in their Ring areas is reduced by 3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 card. Blank the text of 1 card in your opponent's Ring area for the rest of the turn. If your next card played this turn is a card with the Raw logo, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played non-0F maneuver and if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent. The maneuver does its normal damage, regardless of overturned Reversal cards. Your opponent then puts Maneuver cards from his Ring area into his Ringside pile until his Fortitude Rating is equal to or less than that maneuver's F. End your opponent's turn. When played by Raw GM Eric Bischoff, you choose the cards instead of your opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack any card with the word 'McMahon' in the title. You may pack Enforcers in your Backstage area. Reveal any number of Raw Enforcer cards and choose 1 Enforcer, then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the Raw logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your non-GM opponents cannot play Stipulation cards.

card.name: Stone Cold, Triple H, or ... Christian?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card. ≥ Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +5 Superstar Ability: +Once during each of your turns you may draw 1 card and then put 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your Arsenal. ≥ Hand Size: +10 Superstar Value: +3 Superstar Ability: +None - isn't his Starting Hand Size enough?!?!? ≥ Hand Size: +4 Superstar Value: +1 Superstar Ability: +Blank non-Stun-Value card-drawing effects on cards played from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Chris Jericho, Kane, or ... D-Von Dudley?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card. ≥ Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +3 Superstar Ability: +Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then your opponent discards 1 card. ≥ Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +2 Superstar Ability: +Before your Draw Segment, your opponent overturns 1 card. ≥ Hand Size: +5 Superstar Value: +1 Superstar Ability: +When you successfully play a maneuver, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal. When successfully played, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If an effect requires you to discard the card titled Escape Move or Step Aside, you may discard this card instead. When overturned, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

card.name: There Can Only Be One Dominant Female in WWE

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by a Female Superstar. Cannot be reversed when played by Smackdown GM Stephanie McMahon. When your opponent is a Male Superstar, shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, where # is equal to your Superstar Value, and then draw up to 2 cards. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, your opponent discards 3 cards and then overturns # cards, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Torrie Wilson. When played by a Female Superstar, this card is -3F. Overturn 6 cards, shuffle up to 9 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. When this card is in your Ring area, when your opponent reverses an Action or Maneuver from his hand, you may put the reversed card on the bottom of your Arsenal instead of in your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by The Rock or The People's Champ. Search your Arsenal for up to 2 non-unique Maneuver or Action cards with the Smackdown logo, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack Enforcers in your Backstage area. Reveal any number of SmackDown! Enforcer cards and choose 1 Enforcer, then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the SmackDown! logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You count as Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley. Your non-GM opponents cannot play Stipulation cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card. ≥ Hand Size: +5 Superstar Value: +5 Superstar Ability: +Before your Draw Segment, put 1 card from your Ringside pile at the bottom of your Arsenal. ≥ Hand Size: +6 Superstar Value: +4 Superstar Ability: +Once during each of your turns you may discard 2 cards and then put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand. ≥ Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +1 Superstar Ability: +When you successfully play a High Risk maneuver, shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

card.name: Rikishi, Chris Benoit, or ... Eddie Guerrero?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card. ≥ Hand Size: +6 Superstar Value: +4 Superstar Ability: +Once during each of your turns you may discard 2 cards and then search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. ≥ Hand Size: +6 Superstar Value: +1 Superstar Ability: +The first maneuver you play each turn is +1D, the second +2D, the third +3D, and so forth. ≥ Hand Size: +7 Superstar Value: +1 Superstar Ability: +The first High Risk maneuver you play each turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, if you are a GM Superstar, choose 1 different Enforcer. As a reversal, reverse any Raw or Smackdown Action card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when the card titled Backstage Politics is in your Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's cards cannot be reversed from your hand. When your opponent reverses a card from his hand, put this card into his Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when your opponent is a Female Superstar. Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Superstar Value is 3 or greater and also greater than your opponent's Superstar Value. When this card is in your Ring area, during any turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your next non-unique card played this turn is -12F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -10F, discard this card and draw 1 card. As a reversal, can only be played if you and your opponent both have a card in your Ring areas with the Raw logo or both have a card in your Ring areas with the Smackdown logo. Reverse any card if it is not the first card played this turn and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot play manuevers of 3D or greater. Your Arsenal may only contain 45 cards. Your cards titled Puppies! Puppies! are Set-up cards, -10F, and read as 'Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, draw 2 cards, your opponent overturns 2 cards, and end your turn.'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by a Male superstar. Can only be played after a successfully played Grapple maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and end your opponent's turn. The menuever does it's normal damage, regardless of overturned Reversal cards. Put those overturned cards on top of this card instead of in your Ringside pile. During your turn, you may skip your Draw Segment and then put up to 4 cards on top of this card into your hand, put the rest into your Ringside pile, and end your turn.
